word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，与quantity近义，但强调整体，指把所有数量、重量及度量归并在一起得出的总数。
普通用词，指简单加算的结果。
普通用词，指人或物的数目，强调数的概念。
书面用词，指事物的总量和总数量，侧重大批计量，含准确测量的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 总计, 总共达到；实际上是
最高数额；最大的量；最大数量
大量工作；工作量；运动量

bilingual.source: Please check the amount of money in your account.
bilingual.target: 请检查你账户中的钱数量。

bilingual.source: The amount of sugar in this recipe is too high.
bilingual.target: 这个食谱中的糖数量太多了。

bilingual.source: The amount of rainfall this year is below average.
bilingual.target: 今年的降雨数量低于平均水平。

bilingual.source: Recycling can help reduce the amount of wastes.
bilingual.target: 回收利用可以帮助减少废物的数量。

bilingual.source: The amount of traffic on the roads has increased recently.
bilingual.target: 最近道路上的交通数量增加了。

bilingual.source: They are working to reduce the amount of plastic waste.
bilingual.target: 他们正在努力减少塑料垃圾的数量。

bilingual.source: Using bioplastic can help decrease the amount of plastic waste.
bilingual.target: 使用生物塑料可以帮助减少塑料废物的数量。

bilingual.source: He was surprised by the amount of work he had to do.
bilingual.target: 他对自己需要完成的工作数量感到惊讶。

bilingual.source: The paltry amount of food was not enough to feed everyone.
bilingual.target: 微不足道的食物数量不足以养活所有人。

bilingual.source: She was appalled by the amount of waste produced by the factory.
bilingual.target: 她对工厂产生的废物数量感到惊骇。

list.abstract: amount是一个英语单词，当做名词用时翻译为量，数量；总额；全部含义；当做不及物动词时翻译为（在意义、价值、效果、程度等方面） 等于；等同，接近；合计，总共；发展成为。

yingyinNormal.en: The problem is gravity. How to get a viable amount of human life off the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题是地心引力。如何才能把一定数量的人类带离这个星球。

yingyinNormal.en: Then double the amount of floggings and executions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把鞭刑和处决的数目加到双倍。

yingyinNormal.en: They're using him to get to me. That's why the bail amount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是在利用他抓我，所以保释金这么多。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, that's just the minimum amount due, that's your total due.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，那只是最低应缴金额，总金额在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought that you couldn't get hurt here. Only the right amount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为游客在乐园里不会受伤。不会受重伤。

yingyinNormal.en: And I would've paid ten times that amount. You're not going to jail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是再出十倍我也愿意，你不会进监狱的。

yingyinNormal.en: I imagine you'd like bail set at an amount lower than the ASA requested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你希望保释金低于助理检察官的要求。

yingyinNormal.en: He sent a cheque so I can pay off the full amount and wipe the slate clean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他给了我张支票，让我得以全额偿还，把债务偿清。

yingyinNormal.en: The amount of Vibranium he made off with, I don't think it's just one thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他偷走了大量振金...我觉得这只是其一。

yingyinNormal.en: Essentially. There's a tremendous amount of unused space in copper power lines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本质上是的，铜质输电线路中存在庞大的未用空间。

yingyinNormal.en: In addition to intermittent outages, a considerable amount of havoc has been wreaked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目前不仅信号断断续续，还引发了大规模的破坏。

yingyinNormal.en: I have everything I need to find the Machine, and no amount of kicking will change that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有能帮我找到机器的东西，我都找齐了，不论你再怎么踢都无力回天了。

yingyinNormal.en: You get a huge amount of satisfaction seeing a loaf coming out of the oven that you've made.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你看到从烤箱里做好的面包时，有一种巨大的满足感。

yingyinNormal.en: My wife has been under a great amount of stress these past 24 hours. She's clearly in shock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妻子过去这一天一直压力很大。她显然还余惊未定。

yingyinNormal.en: They have Twizzlers instead of Red Vines. No amount of lumbar support can compensate for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们只有Twizzlers没有Red Vines[糖果品牌]，无论多好的腰椎支撑都是无法弥补的。

yingyinNormal.en: Use an amount ending in 8, which is particularly lucky in Chinese culture, and avoid the number 4.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数字必须以8结尾，这在中国的文化中被看作是非常幸运的，同时要避免使用4这个数字。

yingyinNormal.en: In order for that amount of power to be contained that base has to have some kind of thermal oscillator.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要成功装载规模如此大的武器基地必须有某种热振荡器。

yingyinNormal.en: Harold. The port used to hack Khan's system sent a small amount of data back to an off-site I.P. Address.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈罗德，黑可汗系统的端口发了少量数据到外边的一个IP地址。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry? I believe one day Sheldon will eat an enormous amount of Thai food and split into two Sheldons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？我相信总有一天谢尔顿吃了足够多的泰国菜然后分裂成两个。

yingyinNormal.en: However, our examination of the vehicle did reveal a small amount of blood on the passenger side dashboard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我们检查了车辆并且在副驾驶仪表盘上发现了少量血液。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 合计; 数量; 金额

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 总计；总共达到；实际上是

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
add up;
a quantity of something
sense_info_list.zh: 合计; 数量; 金额

examination_example.sentence: This is why researchers generally regard so-called moral guilt, in the right <highlight>amount</highlight>, to be a good thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么研究人员普遍认为所谓的道德负罪感，在合理范围内的话，是一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: I never feel overwhelmed with the <highlight>amount</highlight> of information my brain absorbs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我从来不会因为大脑吸收的庞大信息量而感到难以承受。

examination_example.sentence: The problem is not necessarily the <highlight>amount</highlight> of available funding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题不一定是可用资金的数量。

sense_info_list.en: be the same in meaning or effect

examination_example.sentence: Someone is bound to point out that it <highlight>amounts</highlight> to the bare minimum necessary to keep the Postal Service afloat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人一定会指出，这等同于邮政服务运转所必需的最低限度。

word_usage.usage: amount作名词，表示“数量；数额”时，通常使用an amount of的结构，其后要接不可数名词，如：an amount of time 大量时间。
amount为不及物动词，其后常与介词to连用，表示“总共，总计”，如：amount to 50 dollars 共计50美元。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 总计；总共达到；实际上是

sense_info_list.en:
add up;
a quantity of something

examination_example.sentence: Some correlation between the <highlight>amount</highlight> of homework done by a student and future academic achievement for middle and high school students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中学生的家庭作业量和未来的学业成绩之间存在一定的相关性。

examination_example.sentence: We gathered a massive <highlight>amount</highlight> of data about the local plant life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们收集了大量关于当地植物的数据。

examination_example.sentence: The total <highlight>amount</highlight> of damage to Notre Dame Cathedral can be assessed only when its structure is considered safe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在确认大教堂结构安全之前，无法完整清点出火灾造成的损失。

examination_example.sentence: They found that adolescents who spent a very small <highlight>amount</highlight> of time on digital devices-a couple of hours a week-had the highest wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现那些在每周只花两三个小时使用数码设备的青少年具有最高的幸福指数。

examination_example.sentence: This could reduce the <highlight>amount</highlight> of steel needed to make everything from automobiles to buildings and bridges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会减少用于制造汽车、建筑和桥梁的钢材数量。

examination_example.sentence: Such levies are no universal remedy as the <highlight>amounts</highlight> raised would be tiny compared with what has been taken away by central government since 2010.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类税收并不是万能的，因为与2010年以来中央政府征收的税收相比，征收的金额微不足道。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
add up; 
a quantity of something

examination_example.sentence: Most of them engage with potential donors, since projects that answered questions from interested donors fared better. And they target a small <highlight>amount</highlight> of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数都与潜在捐助者进行接触，因为回答感兴趣的捐助者问题的项目进展得更好。并且他们的目标金额不多。

examination_example.sentence: This is 10 times the <highlight>amount</highlight> this new microwave oven study estimates for annual emissions for all the microwave ovens in the EU.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个数据是这项新的微波炉研究所预估的欧盟所有微波炉年排放量的10倍。

examination_example.sentence: Lost income alone <highlight>amounts</highlight> to $225 billion a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅年收入损失就达2250亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: They didn't report the specific <highlight>amount</highlight> of bacteria that made it from the tiles to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们没有报告细菌从瓷砖到食物的具体数量。

sense_info_list.en: be the same in meaning or effect

examination_example.sentence: Hungry customers can pay whatever <highlight>amount</highlight> they can afford to eat at the café, or nothing at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饥肠辘辘的顾客可以在咖啡厅支付他们能支付得起的任何金额，也可以一分钱都不付。

examination_example.sentence: I'm not familiar with your neighbor or his particular setup, but that <highlight>amount</highlight> is definitely possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不了解你的邻居或者是他具体是如何安装的，但达到这个金额是绝对有可能的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: add up; a quantity of something

examination_example.sentence: The project also resulted in a reduction in the <highlight>amount</highlight> of medicines used to perform medical-imaging (医学影像) procedures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目还减少了用于执行医学影像程序的药物数量。

examination_example.sentence: As the number of tourists has grown, so has the <highlight>amount</highlight> of traffic on the roads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着游客数量的增加，道路上的交通流量也在增加。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>amount</highlight> of time spent in reading each session has declined.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读每一部分所花费的时间减少了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Also, a regular <highlight>amount</highlight> of vitamins A and B2 should also be taken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，还应该服用适量的维生素A和B2。

examination_example.sentence: They didn’t worry about the <highlight>amount</highlight> of petrol cars used, either.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们也不担心汽油汽车的使用量。

examination_example.sentence: Eat a small <highlight>amount</highlight> of food slowly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 慢慢吃少量食物。
